job.name: stop
job.description: stop the web servers -- shows how to use a step error handler, and node rank ordering

command.script:
#!/usr/bin/env bash #/ usage: $0 ?dir? ?method?
set -eu
(( $# != 2 )) && { grep '^#/ usage:' <"$0" | cut -c4- >&2 exit 2 } DIR=$1 METHOD=$2
if [[ -f "$DIR/pid" ]] then PID=$(< "$DIR/pid") echo "kill $PID" rm -f $DIR/pid echo "- Web stopped (pid=${PID}) using method: $METHOD" | tee -a $DIR/log fi
